name: World Chess Championship
description:
Main Features:
・Online Chess
Designed for practicing real-world chess with world-wide opponent.

・Competition
ELO rating based Ranking & Matching

・Guest & Google profile
You can play anonymously.

・Review
You can review all the game of yours and top 100's

・Forum
Auto translated chess forum provided

Features:
・Play a match against a friend on one device
・Chat with online opponents

ETC:
If you want to play off-line chess, We recommend you to play our another product 'Chess Tournament'.
